draw_prompt: A five-person military squad in matching tactical gear, moving tactically through smoke-filled urban ruins with rifles ready. Members wear armored vests with visible squad insignia, maintaining formation while checking equipment. A camouflaged armored vehicle smolders in the background, with distant burning buildings under overcast skies. Realistic style with muted olive and grey tones.
